name: vscode-tarantool-luatest-adapter
description: Run your Tarantool luatest tests in the Sidebar of Visual Studio Code
author: Viktor Sevastyanov <mivallion@gmail.com>

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

tarantoolLuatestAdapter.luaTestExe.description: Path to luatest executable. Defaults to '.rocks/bin/luatest'

tarantoolLuatestAdapter.testGlob.description: Glob used to find test files. Defaults to '**/*[tT]est*.{lua}'

tarantoolLuatestAdapter.testGroupRegex.description: Regex used to find tests. Defaults to /^local (?<group_var>[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z*_]*)\s*=\s*[a-zA-Z]*.group\(['"](?<group_name>[a-z-A-Z_]*)['"]\)/gm

tarantoolLuatestAdapter.testRegex.description: Regex used to find tests. Defaults to /^(?<group_var>[a-zA-Z_]*)\.(?<test>[tT]est[a-zA-Z0-9_]*)\s*=\s*function\s*(?:[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*:)?\s*\(\)(?:.*)$/gm

tarantoolLuatestAdapter.decorationRegex.description: Regex used to find line number and failure message. Defaults to /\.lua:(?<line>[1-9][0-9]*):(?<message>.*)stack traceback:/

tarantoolLuatestAdapter.logpanel.description: Write diagnotic logs to an output panel

tarantoolLuatestAdapter.logfile.description: Write diagnostic logs to the given file
